00063 void radio_interface_init(void) {
00064         //Initialize the serial rx buffer used for the communication with the radio
00065         radio_serial_rx_buffer = (unsigned char *)malloc(RADIO_SERIAL_RX_BUFFER_LENGTH);
00066         radio_serial_rx_buffer_start = radio_serial_rx_buffer;
00067         
00068         radio_status.box_sent_request = 0;
00069         
00070         if ((radio_settings.interface_type == RADIO_INTERFACE_CAT_POLL) | (radio_settings.interface_type == RADIO_INTERFACE_CAT_MON)) {
00071                 switch (radio_settings.baudrate) {
00072                         case RADIO_SERIAL_BAUDRATE_1200 : usart3_init(766, radio_settings.stopbits);
00073                                                                                                                                                                 usart1_init(766, radio_settings.stopbits);
00074                                                                                                                                                                 break;
00075                         case RADIO_SERIAL_BAUDRATE_2400 : usart3_init(383, radio_settings.stopbits);
00076                                                                                                                                                                 usart1_init(383, radio_settings.stopbits);
00077                                                                                                                                                                 break;
00078                         case RADIO_SERIAL_BAUDRATE_4800 : usart3_init(191, radio_settings.stopbits);
00079                                                                                                                                                                 usart1_init(191, radio_settings.stopbits);
00080                                                                                                                                                                 break;
00081                         case RADIO_SERIAL_BAUDRATE_9600 :       usart3_init(95, radio_settings.stopbits);
00082                                                                                                                                                                 usart1_init(95, radio_settings.stopbits);
00083                                                                                                                                                                 break;
00084                         case RADIO_SERIAL_BAUDRATE_14400 :      usart3_init(63, radio_settings.stopbits);
00085                                                                                                                                                                         usart1_init(63, radio_settings.stopbits);
00086                                                                                                                                                                 break;
00087                         case RADIO_SERIAL_BAUDRATE_19200 :      usart3_init(47, radio_settings.stopbits);
00088                                                                                                                                                                         usart1_init(47, radio_settings.stopbits);
00089                                                                                                                                                                 break;
00090                         case RADIO_SERIAL_BAUDRATE_28800 :      usart3_init(31, radio_settings.stopbits);
00091                                                                                                                                                                         usart1_init(31, radio_settings.stopbits);
00092                                                                                                                                                                 break;
00093                         case RADIO_SERIAL_BAUDRATE_38400 :      usart3_init(23, radio_settings.stopbits);
00094                                                                                                                                                                         usart1_init(23, radio_settings.stopbits);
00095                                                                                                                                                                 break;
00096                         case RADIO_SERIAL_BAUDRATE_57600 :      usart3_init(15, radio_settings.stopbits);
00097                                                                                                                                                                         usart1_init(15, radio_settings.stopbits);
00098                                                                                                                                                                 break;
00099                 }
00100         }
00101 }
00102 
00104 void radio_process_tasks(void) {
00105         if (radio_flags & (1<<RADIO_FLAG_FREQ_CHANGED)) {
00106                 radio_status.current_band = radio_freq_to_band(radio_status.current_freq);      
00107         }
00108 }

00121         return(radio_status.current_band);

00125 void radio_ptt_active(void) {
00126         if (runtime_settings.radio_ptt_output) {
00127                 /* Activate the PTT to the radio */
00128                 PORTJ |= (1<<3);
00129                 
00130                 ptt_status |= (1<<RADIO_FLAG_RADIO_PTT);
00131                 main_update_ptt_status();
00132         }
00133 }
00134 
00136 void radio_ptt_deactive(void) {
00137         /* Deactivate the PTT to the radio */
00138         PORTJ &= ~(1<<3);
00139         
00140         ptt_status &= ~(1<<RADIO_FLAG_RADIO_PTT);
00141         main_update_ptt_status();
00142 }
00143 
00145 void radio_tx_active(void) {
00146         PORTG |= (1<<TX_ACTIVE_OUTPUT_BIT);
00147         
00148         ptt_status |= (1<<RADIO_FLAG_TX_ACTIVE);
00149         main_update_ptt_status();
00150 }
00151 
00153 void radio_tx_deactive(void) {
00154         /* Deactivate the PTT to the radio */
00155         PORTG &= ~(1<<TX_ACTIVE_OUTPUT_BIT);
00156         
00157         ptt_status &= ~(1<<RADIO_FLAG_TX_ACTIVE);
00158         main_update_ptt_status();
00159 }
00161 void radio_inhibit_high(void) {
00162         //This signal is inverted in hardware, because of a transistor output with pullup
00163         PORTE &= ~(1<<RADIO_INHIBIT_OUTPUT_BIT);
00164 }
00165 
00167 void radio_inhibit_low(void) {
00168         //This signal is inverted in hardware, because of a transistor output with pullup
00169         PORTE |= (1<<RADIO_INHIBIT_OUTPUT_BIT);
00170 }
00171 
00173 unsigned char radio_get_ptt_status(void) {
00174         return(ptt_status);
00175 }
00176 
00180 unsigned char radio_get_band_portion(void) {
00181         if ((radio_status.current_freq >= band_ctrl_get_low_portion_low(radio_status.current_band)) && (radio_status.current_freq < band_ctrl_get_low_portion_high(radio_status.current_band)))
00182                 return (BAND_LOW);
00183         else if ((radio_status.current_freq >= band_ctrl_get_high_portion_low(radio_status.current_band)) && (radio_status.current_freq <= band_ctrl_get_high_portion_high(radio_status.current_band)))
00184                 return (BAND_HIGH);
00185         
00186         return(BAND_UNDEFINED);
00187 }
00188 
00191 void radio_set_current_band(unsigned char band) {
00192         radio_status.current_band = band;
00193 }

00197 unsigned char radio_poll_ptt(void) {
00198         //TODO: implement the sense stuff
00199         
00200         return(RADIO_PTT_DEACTIVE);
00201 }
00202 
00205 unsigned char radio_poll_status(void) {
00206         //We dont poll the band data if we are transmitting, that will just increase the risk
00207         //of corrupted band data
00208         if (main_get_inhibit_state() != INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND_RADIO_TX) {
00209                 //Ask radio for freq etc
00210                 if (radio_settings.interface_type == RADIO_INTERFACE_BCD) {
00211                         if (main_get_inhibit_state() != INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND_RADIO_TX) {
00212                                 internal_comm_add_tx_message(INT_COMM_GET_BAND_BCD_STATUS,0,NULL);
00213                         }
00214                 }
00215                 else if (radio_settings.interface_type == RADIO_INTERFACE_CAT_POLL) {
00216                         //The radio model is ICOM, we will send out a frequency request to the radio
00217                         if (radio_settings.radio_model == RADIO_MODEL_ICOM) {
00218                                 usart3_transmit(0xFE);
00219                                 usart3_transmit(0xFE);
00220                                 usart3_transmit(radio_settings.civ_addr);
00221                                 usart3_transmit(0xE0); //We simulate that we are the computer by using its address
00222                                 usart3_transmit(0x03);
00223                                 usart3_transmit(0xFD);
00224                         }
00225                         
00226                         //We update frequency directly after the request has been sent. This means we probably don't see the update at once
00227                         //but it will still atleast update
00228                         display_update_radio_freq();
00229                 }
00230                 else if (radio_settings.interface_type == RADIO_INTERFACE_CAT_MON) {
00231                         display_update_radio_freq();
00232                 }
00233         }
00234         
00235         return(0);
00236 }
00237 
00243 unsigned int radio_parse_freq(unsigned char *freq_data, unsigned char length, unsigned char radio_model) {
00244         unsigned int freq=0;
00245         
00246         if (radio_model == RADIO_MODEL_KENWOOD) {
00247                 //TODO: Not tested
00248 
00249                 for (unsigned char i=3;i<8;i++) {
00250                         if (i == 3)
00251                                 freq = *(freq_data - 48) * 10000;
00252                         else if (i == 4)
00253                                 freq += *(freq_data - 48) * 1000;
00254                         else if (i == 5)
00255                                 freq += *(freq_data - 48) * 100;
00256                         else if (i == 6)
00257                                 freq += *(freq_data - 48) * 10;
00258                         else
00259                                 freq += *(freq_data - 48);
00260                 }
00261         }
00262         else if (radio_model == RADIO_MODEL_ICOM) {
00263                 //TODO: Not tested
00264 
00265                 freq =  ((0xF0 & *(freq_data+8))>>4) * 10000;
00266                 freq += ( 0x0F & *(freq_data+8)) * 1000;
00267                 freq += ((0xF0 & *(freq_data+7))>>4) * 100;
00268                 freq += ( 0x0F & *(freq_data+7)) * 10;
00269                 freq += ((0xF0 & *(freq_data+6))>>4);
00270         }
00271         else if (radio_model == RADIO_MODEL_FT1000MKV) {
00272                 //TODO: Not tested
00273 
00274                 if (length != 16)
00275                         return(0);
00276                 
00277                 /* Operating frequency for FT1000MKV is 4 bytes located on positions 1, 2, 3, 4 in the received data.
00278                  * Operating mode is in position 7. */
00279                 freq =  ( 0x0F & *(freq_data+4)) * 10000;
00280                 freq += ((0xF0 & *(freq_data+3))>>4) * 1000;
00281                 freq += ( 0x0F & *(freq_data+3)) * 100;
00282                 freq += ((0xF0 & *(freq_data+2))>>4) * 10;
00283                 freq += ( 0x0F & *(freq_data+2));
00284         }
00285         else if (radio_model == RADIO_MODEL_FT1000) {
00286                 /*TODO: This is very tricky to implement without the FT1000 firmware upgrade.
00287                                                 But hopefully we will be able to implement this */
00288         }
00289         
00290         return(freq);
00291 }

00294 void radio_amp_ptt_active(void) {
00295         if (runtime_settings.amplifier_ptt_output) {
00296                 PORTE |= (1<<AMPLIFIER_OUTPUT_BIT);
00297         
00298                 ptt_status |= (1<<RADIO_FLAG_AMP_PTT);
00299                 main_update_ptt_status();
00300         }
00301 }
00302 
00304 void radio_amp_ptt_deactive(void) {
00305         PORTE &= ~(1<<AMPLIFIER_OUTPUT_BIT);
00306         
00307         ptt_status &= ~(1<<RADIO_FLAG_AMP_PTT);
00308         main_update_ptt_status();
00309 }

00311 
00315 unsigned char radio_freq_to_band(unsigned int freq) {
00316         for (unsigned char i=0;i<9;i++)
00317                 if ((freq >= band_ctrl_get_low_portion_low(i+1)) && (freq <= band_ctrl_get_high_portion_high(i+1)))
00318                         return(i+1);
00319         
00320         //If the freq isn't in the band array then we just return BAND_UNDEFINED
00321         return(BAND_UNDEFINED);
00322 }

00415 void radio_communicaton_timeout(void) {
00416         radio_serial_rx_buffer = radio_serial_rx_buffer_start;
00417         
00418         radio_status.box_sent_request = 0;
00419 }
